title: Shifting and/or interchanging the purpose of existing amenity/reservations: In the case of specific
clause_text: Shifting and/or interchanging the purpose of existing amenity/reservations: In the case of specific existing amenity/reservations in the DP, the Commissioner, with the consent of owners may shift, interchange the existing amenity/reservation in the same or on, adjoining lands in the same zone, provided that the relocated existing amenity/reservation abuts a public street of same or more width as per DP and shall have the same amount of visibility
section: Development of the existing amenity/reservation/partly existing amenity/partly reserved/amenity Plot:
